name: front-end-starter-kit
description: Front-end starter kit that bundles Javascript, has a css base, and a templating system.

scripts.build:scripts: browserify source/scripts/main.js -o dist/main.js && uglifyjs dist/main.js -o dist/main.min.js --source-map dist/main.js.map -p relative
scripts.build:styles: mkdirp dist/styles && node-sass --output-style expanded --source-comments source/styles/main.scss dist/styles/main.css && postcss -m -u autoprefixer -u cssnano -o dist/styles/main.min.css dist/styles/main.css
scripts.start: browser-sync start --server dist --files 'dist/**/*.css, dist/*.html, dist/**/*.html, dist/**/*.js'
